Railroad All-stars (2006) 90 min 
Director and screenwriter: Chema RodrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â­guez

A documentary on Guatemalan sex workers who, in order to be treated with dignity and prevent murder and police repression, formed a soccer team in 2004 and joined their local five-a-side league,  The league's organizer expelled them when they revealed their profession, bringing about a media frenzy.
